c74object.name: cs.2click-remote
c74object.description: Permits messages to connect and disconnect cs.2click modules.

method.name: set
method.description: Route audio between the two named modules. If no slot number is provided, the first empty slot will be used. If there are no empty slots, the connection will fail unless the steal attribute is turned on.

method.name: clear
method.digest: Clear a cs.2click module or slot
method.description: Clear the connection between the named module slot and its paired slot. If no slot number is provided, this message will clear all the named module’s slots and their pairings.

attribute.name: steal
attribute.description: Given as input, the word steal, followed by a 0 or a non-zero number, disables or enables steal mode. If steal mode is enabled, when an attempt is made to route audio to or from an already full cs.2click module, rather than aborting, one of the full slots will be cleared and used.

example.caption: A “set my-module my-other-module” message will connect those two modules together

c74object.discussion: This abstraction permits scripting access to the cs.2click system for cases where it is necessary to use messages to control routing.
